message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider that?
